name: FindMyThirdDigit
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: find my third digit
des:
As an initiative I'm launching this crazy fun game, where Alexa will tell you the third number you missed out. Easy to play. Follow the guidelines 

For instance:
User: Alexa, launch find my third digit
Alexa: Take a 3 digit number, sum it and subtract it with the output and provide me any two digit from the result. 
User: XX
Alexa: Your 3rd digit is "x".

Calculation Example: 
Step 1: 111
step 2: sum of 3 digit is 3
Step 3: 111-3 is 108
Step 4: Say any two values to get the third digit from Alexa.

Try out and post your comments or Feedback.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
